biotools.summary: a comprehensive database for interactive analysis of genes/proteins involved in the pathogenesis of vitiligo. A comprehensive resource for Vitiligo. Vitiligo Information resource (VIRdb) is a comprehensive database which systematically mounts all the information relating to vitiligo in terms of Potential protein targets and differentially expressed genes in a user-friendly database.

bioschemas.name: VIRdb
